title: Use GetToolsDirectory32 explicitly for NuGet imports
body:
Some Microsoft-internal build environments override the property MSBuildToolsPath32
with a value that isn't actually the right thing, so explicitly call the property
function instead.

Fixes [AB#1334751](https://devdiv.visualstudio.com/0bdbc590-a062-4c3f-b0f6-9383f67865ee/_workitems/edit/1334751).

commit.message:
Use GetToolsDirectory32 explicitly for NuGet imports

Some Microsoft-internal build environments override the property MSBuildToolsPath32
with a value that isn't actually the right thing, so explicitly call the property
function instead.

Fixes AB#1334751.

nodes.body: Overriding because the failure is due to the new compiler that's fixed elsewhere.
